alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:55AM CDT until April 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR CEDAR AND SOUTHERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 355 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near El Dorado Springs, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Stockton State Park, El Dorado Springs, Stockton, Jerico Springs, Collins, Umber View Heights, Bearcreek, Masters, Olympia, Caplinger Mills, Wagoner, Arnica, Filley, Cedar Springs and Cane Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
